headline: Is the AI bubble helping or hurting software’s outlook for 2026?
summary: Investing.com -- RBC Capital Markets wrapped up a weeklong European marketing tour that spanned seven cities and nearly fifty client meetings, giving the bank a clear view of how investors are thinking about software heading into 2026.

content.title: Is the AI bubble helping or hurting software’s outlook for 2026?
content.summary: Investing.com -- RBC Capital Markets wrapped up a weeklong European marketing tour that spanned seven cities and nearly fifty client meetings, giving the bank a clear view of how investors are thinking about software heading into 2026.

headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From Salesforce’s Q3 Earnings Call
summary: Salesforce’s third quarter results drew a positive market response, with management crediting strong adoption of its AI-driven AgentForce platform and robust execution across core segments. CEO Marc Benioff highlighted that AgentForce ARR reached about $540 million, up 330% year over year, and emphasized that customer demand for AI-powered solutions is accelerating, especially as enterprises seek to integrate automation with their existing workflows. headline: Saltbox Mgmt Expands Capabilities for Salesforce Agentforce Revenue Management and Agentforce Commerce Interoperability
summary: Saltbox Mgmt today announced expanded capabilities to support Salesforce's new interoperability between Agentforce Revenue Management (ARM, formerly Revenue Cloud Advanced) and Agentforce Commerce (formerly Commerce Cloud), including the launch of its Commerce by Contract offering, which brings contract-driven purchasing directly into the commerce experience.

content.title: Saltbox Mgmt Expands Capabilities for Salesforce Agentforce Revenue Management and Agentforce Commerce Interoperability
content.summary: Saltbox Mgmt today announced expanded capabilities to support Salesforce's new interoperability between Agentforce Revenue Management (ARM, formerly Revenue Cloud Advanced) and Agentforce Commerce (formerly Commerce Cloud), including the launch of its Commerce by Contract offering, which brings contract-driven purchasing directly into the commerce experience.
